title: [Seamist Hall, Surf]
description: A dark color, the ocean is muddled with rough undercurrents that send waves crashing on to the shore.  A shadowy stretch of beach is barely visible a short distance away, its length spreading out like a black blanket lit by lights shining forth from the seaside city of Solhaven.

A balmy, clear color, the ocean is muddled with rough undercurrents that send waves crashing on to the shore.  A stretch of rocky beach is clearly visible a short distance away, its length spreading out on either side to show off the seaside city of Solhaven.
